artifact.contents:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<testsuites tests="9" failed="0">
  <testsuite name="Authorization Failure Reporting"/>
  <testsuite name="Configure SDK to authorize all requests using a specific access token"/>
  <testsuite name="Inspect the access token which the SDK is using to authorize requests"/>
  <testsuite name="Grant an access token">
    <testcase name="Grant an access token with all permissions on all resource types with authorized uuid" steps="66"/>
    <testcase name="Grant an access token without an authorized uuid" steps="9"/>
    <testcase name="Grant an access token successfully with an authorized uuid" steps="10"/>
    <testcase name="Attempt to grant an access token with all permissions empty or false and expect a server error" steps="12"/>
    <testcase name="Attempt to grant an access token with a regular expression containing a syntax error and expect a server error" steps="12"/>
    <testcase name="Attempt to grant an access token with a regular expression containing capturing groups and expect a server error" steps="12"/>
  </testsuite>
  <testsuite name="Parse Access Token">
    <testcase name="Validate that a token containing authorized uuid can be parsed correctly" steps="4"/>
    <testcase name="Validate that a token containing uuid resource permissions can be parsed correctly" steps="5"/>
    <testcase name="Validate that a token containing uuid pattern permissions can be parsed correctly" steps="5"/>
  </testsuite>
  <testsuite name="Revoke an access token"/>
  <testsuite name="provide an access token to the the SDK to authorize requests"/>
  <testsuite name="Files"/>
  <testsuite name="History"/>
  <testsuite name="Message Actions"/>
  <testsuite name="Publish a message"/>
  <testsuite name="Signal"/>
  <testsuite name="Push Notifications"/>
  <testsuite name="Subscribe Loop auto-retry with access denied"/>
  <testsuite name="Message encryption"/>
  <testsuite name="Subscribe Loop"/>
  <testsuite name="Time"/>
</testsuites>
